title: How to Tie a Two Half Hitch Knot

steps.headline: Pass the end of your rope around a post.
Bring the end under the standing part of the rope.
Bring the end up and pass it through the eye of the loop you just formed.
Pull it tight to complete a half hitch.
Take the end of the rope under the standing part (again).

text: Pass the end of your rope around a post.  Bring the end under the standing part of the rope.  Bring the end up and pass it through the eye of the loop you just formed.  Pull it tight to complete a half hitch.  Take the end of the rope under the standing part (again).  Tie another half hitch.  Pull it tight.  Finished.
